item.description:
SINGLES DANCE

Saturday, May, 14th. 8:00 PM to 1 am.

The Radisson formally the Sheraton Tara

spit brook rd exit 1, off of rt.3

Nashua, NH 03061 603-938-5695

Host: Steve Obermiller. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Proper attire is required. No jeans or sneakers, no work boots.

    We have been informed, that the Radisson is now under new management, and they refurbished the the ballroom, a/c, lights and more.  So, please join Steve O. and 20 to 80 friends for an evening of dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 300 singles, in a ballroom setting. Meet and dance with the most tasteful variety of people and ages you will find anywhere. Because of the popularity of this Dance. Tables and seats will be hard to hold much past 8:30. Plus, the Cover Charge goes from $10 to $12 after 9 pm. So, please get there as close to 8 pm as possible. So, you can meet some new people as Steve O. introduces you to everyone at our tables. Also, ask where Steve O. or Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door. They will show you where our tables are. , www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Singles Dance Nashua, NH.
